price: 63. Mpe bawumbu ya Ar-Rahmân bazali baye batambolaka likolo ya mabele na malembe mpe limemia na komikitisa, mpe soki batumoli bango na baye bayebi eloko te, bayanoli bango été: Kimia.
arabic: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمۡشُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هَوۡنٗا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ ٱلۡجَٰهِلُونَ قَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waʿibādu al-raḥmāni alladhīna yamshūna ʿalā al-arḍi hawnan wa-idhā khāṭabahumu al-jāhilūna qālū salāman
